Package eloquentelks.recommender.api.service

Class DensityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • eloquentelks.recommender.api.service.DensityService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDensityService
    @Service
public class DensityService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDensityService
    This class is responsible for retrieving, normalizing and aggregating the densities of POIs in NYC. The retrieval is delegated to IDensityRestService, while normalization and aggregation are performed in this class.

        Retrieves the result of the density calculation
        Specified by:
        getDensities in interface IDensityService
        Parameters:
        attractionTypes - List of attraction types according to the GeoJSON feature properties.
        Returns:

      • normalizeDensities

        public java.util.List<com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection> normalizeDensities​(java.util.List<com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection> featureCollections)
        Normalize all densities such that they can be aggregated afterwards. This enables the combination of densities for POI categories with any amount of POIs.
        Specified by:
        normalizeDensities in interface IDensityService
        Parameters:
        featureCollections - Contains a FeatureCollection per attraction type
        Returns:
        A list of GeoJSON FeatureCollections with normalized densities

      • normalizeDensity

        public com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection normalizeDensity​(com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection featureCollection)
        Normalize all densities of a single FeatureCollection. Density normalization formula from https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/70801/how-to-normalize-data-to-0-1-range
        Specified by:
        normalizeDensity in interface IDensityService
        Parameters:
        featureCollection - A single FeatureCollection with densities
        Returns:
        A list of GeoJSON FeatureCollections with normalized densities

      • aggregateDensities

        public com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection aggregateDensities​(java.util.List<com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection> featureCollections)
        Combines the poi counts of the specified FeatureCollections into a single aggregated FeatureCollection
        Specified by:
        aggregateDensities in interface IDensityService
        Parameters:
        featureCollections - Contains a FeatureCollection per attraction type
        Returns:
        A single aggregated GeoJSON FeatureCollection with combined densities
